price: Akan tetapi, jika mereka (tawanan-tawanan itu) bermaksud hendak berkhianat kepadamu, maka sesungguhnya mereka telah berkhianat kepada Allah sebelum ini, lalu Allah menjadikan(mu) berkuasa terhadap mereka.  Dan Allah Maha Mengetahui lagi Maha Bijaksana.
arabic: وَإِن يُرِيدُواْ خِيَانَتَكَ فَقَدۡ خَانُواْ ٱللَّهَ مِن قَبۡلُ فَأَمۡكَنَ مِنۡهُمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌ حَكِيمٌ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-in yurīdū khiyānataka faqad khānū al-laha min qablu fa-amkana min'hum wal-lahu ʿalīmun ḥakīmun
